backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features including cyberpunk card styling, logo relocation, poster design adaptation, text visibility fixes, and Swiggy booking URL updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend components describing the MONKEYWORX COLLECTIVE website structure, including navigation, hero section, Holi Grail card, team dossier, ticketing, corporate events, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for background, foreground, borders, and component colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with UTF-8 charset, viewport meta tag, page title 'MONKEYWORX COLLECTIVE', and script loading main.tsx module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the full page layout with Navigation, HeroSection, HoliGrailCard, TeamSection, TicketingSection, CorporateEventsSection, and Footer components in a dark-themed container.
frontend/src/components/CorporateEventsS: Corporate events section displaying four service types (concerts, weddings, corporate parties, private events), bulk discount information, and contact CTA with phone number +91 63633 53339.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with MONKEYWORX branding, quick navigation links, social media icons (Facebook, Instagram @monkeyworxcollective, X), contact phone number, and Caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/GlitchButton.tsx: Reusable button component with cyberpunk styling featuring neon green background, hover transition to hot pink with glow effect, and glitch animation.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section with placeholder image background, MONKEYWORX COLLECTIVE title with glitch effects and drop shadows for visibility, tagline, and SwiggyBookingCTA button.
frontend/src/components/HoliGrailCard.ts: Cyberpunk-styled card component featuring Holi Grail event poster with animated neon glow border, event description, and integrated Swiggy booking CTA button.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Fixed navigation bar component with scroll-based styling, mobile menu toggle, and smooth scrolling to page sections (home, team, tickets, corporate).
frontend/src/components/SwiggyBookingCTA: Call-to-action button component that opens Swiggy Scenes booking link in a new window using the GlitchButton component.
frontend/src/components/TeamSection.tsx: Displays a grid of four team member cards with portraits, names, roles, and ID badges in a cyberpunk-styled dossier format.
frontend/src/components/TicketingSection: Renders five ticket tier options with pricing, features, and styling variations (neonGreen/hotPink borders) for the Holi Grail event.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity state, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend data operations are needed as all content is static and client-side rendered.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom cyberpunk color variables (neon-green, hot-pink, matte-black) and keyframe animations for glitch effects, scanlines, and image distortions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a cyberpunk design system with OKLCH color variables (neon green, hot pink, matte black), custom fonts (Bebas Neue, monospace), container settings, and animation keyframes for accordions.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting MONKEYWORX COLLECTIVE website features including industrial cyberpunk aesthetic, team dossier grid, Holi Grail 5-tier ticketing (₹449-₹78,999), corporate events page, hero video with glitch effects, and Swiggy Scenes integration.
